name: Crack
description: Presence of one or more cracks on the surface of the wind turbine blade, which may compromise its strength and performance.

name: Erosion
description: Gradual wear of the surface of the wind turbine blade due to the impact of natural elements (wind, rain, sand, etc.), which may cause a decrease in its efficiency.

name: Delamination
description: Separation of the different layers that make up the wind turbine blade, which can result in degradation of its structure and performance.

name: Corrosion
description: Chemical process of degradation of the surface of the wind turbine blade due to exposure to moisture, salt, or other corrosive substances, which can cause deterioration of its mechanical properties.

name: Impact damage
description: Damage caused by the impact of external objects (debris, birds, etc.) on the surface of the wind turbine blade, which can result in fractures, deformations, or other defects.
